settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.text: Less Prep and Cleanup Time:With queso to stir and chicken wings to sauce, it’s hard to watch the big game. But when you choose March Madness at-home catering in Raleigh, you’ll never miss the jump ball. Since our talented chefs prepare 90% of your meal, you won’t need to waste hours planning, shopping, and chopping. Plus, after the game, you’ll have minimal mess.

Delicious, Fan-Worthy Recipes:Together, we’ll create a restaurant-quality meal that will please any palette. These recipes take inspiration from the classic flavors you would expect from a stadium concession fan. However, rather than dish up soggy nachos, our talented chefs elevate these flavors with fresh, seasonal produce and sustainably-sourced proteins.

A Lasting Impression:As catering professionals, we know no party is complete without good food. That’s why we have developed a March Madness meal package that includes all the fixings for a rowdy night in. From artfully-crafted dips to savory sliders, we’ll equip you with the appetizers needed to make a lasting impression.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a March Madness Meal Kit?
settings.text2: If you enjoy good food but need some help preparing it, you’ll love Table & Twine’s March Madness meal kit. Other benefits of ordering this package include:

settings.title: How much time is required to prepare the food in my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: Don't spend your whole morning whipping up game-day snacks. Instead, spend one to two hours preparing restaurant-quality appetizers with Table & Twine’s March Madness meal kit.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: If you want to win over guests, place an order for your March Madness meal kit between Tuesday, March 8th and Friday, April 1st. Afterward, crack open a beer and let us do the rest.

settings.title: Can I customize my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: The March Madness meal kit is not customizable. Our chefs carefully curate this package so that there’s a special treat for everyone.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
